abilities.name: Hydroelectric Power
abilities.effect: You may make Floodlight do 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Lanturn but not used to pay for Floodlight's Energy cost. This power can't be used if Lanturn is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Floodlight
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
